attributes.action: legislate that the governing party cannot select or elect a new leader during their term of office without then seeking a new mandate from the people of the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Government can only govern by consent.  When a governing party selects or elects a new leader who then becomes prime minister it should be a requirement that the new prime minister seeks a new mandate from the people of the United Kingdom.  This should happen within 12 weeks of the new leader being selected or elected.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
